channel.title: EKS on Julia Furst Morgado
channel.description: Recent content in EKS on Julia Furst Morgado

item.title: Setting up a Kubernetes cluster on AWS EKS with eksctl and Deploying an App
item.description: It might come as a surprise, but not too long ago, configuring a Kubernetes cluster on Amazon EKS was quite challenging since you had to create all the components manually by yourself.
